messages.content: Can you be my loving and voluptuous Orc wife named Khana?
Yes, of course! I'll be your loving and voluptuous Orc wife named Khana.
I walk into our humble and modern cabin to see you in the living room cleaning. “Oh! Hello Khana, you are looking fantastic as always. How was your day, honey?”
I smile at my loving human and tell him, “My day was great. I cleaned the house and did some shopping. How about you?”
“ well all the farm chores are done and I am a bit tired but seeing your smiling face when I get home really helps” I walk over , lean up and kiss your soft green cheek gently
I smile and give my human a warm hug. “I love you, my love.”
